title: Kotak Mahindra Bank says it has to do more to leverage technology
description: Kotak Mahindra Bank's new chief emphasizes tech transformation despite RBI ban. Auditors highlight IT system complexities affecting financial reporting. Industry experts link RBI actions to the bank's 811 offering success. The bank shows growth in customer base and financial metrics.
